about_the_game:
Join with up to 100 other players in this massive team battle arena game where individual skill, squad tactics, and overall teamwork will determine the victor!

From the makers of the Bloons series comes a brand new IP and brand new game genre - the massive team battle arena game. Mysterious cosmic forces have created the Fightland, and they’ve plucked warriors from across space and time to do battle there. Split into 4 teams of up to 25 players each, each team has enough players to conquer objectives, defend their positions, attack other factions, and scout for loot - it’s how well each team will coordinate and react that determines the winner.

Featuring 3 main hero classes, a range of primary and secondary weapons, outfits that enable both play style and visual style, discoverable Battle Assets that can change the tide of battle, and 3 varied game modes, each game is a unique, exciting challenge.

BUILD YOUR HERO

Going the Brute path gives you access to heavy-hitting weapons, slow but packing a wallop. With Rogue, you are fast on your feet, delivering quick, precision attacks. As a Mage, you can damage enemies at range, heal your allies, or join the fray directly.

CHOOSE YOUR LOADOUT

Each of the 3 Hero types has bespoke primary weapons, secondary items, and armored outfits, with tactical and visual reference from fantasy to steampunk to sci-fi. All weapons and items are designed to support certain playstyles, with the opportunity to create mix and match hybrids.

MASTER YOUR WEAPONS

Weapon progression is almost entirely lateral, so while you unlock new things, each weapon is awesome in its own right and is built to fit a variety of playstyles. But there is one key upgrade to every weapon - Weapon Mastery, where completing challenges with your favorite weapons will unleash their true potential and give them a stunning new look, too!

COMING SOON

To stay up to date with Fightland's development and Steam Playtests that we will host prior to launch, please follow and Wishlist!

name: Fightland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
